20e7c597f4ddfdbd8b1025f909d354b9ddfcf3bb.commitMessage: Issue #5608: Adding support for allowedAnnotations in javadocTypeCheck

641b6b2c0689fc35d6a3d77a7215fd1d9ce2a2b8.commitMessage: Issue #5812: Rename all utility classes to xxxxUtil

82bc23f45d7d57dfa26d1a1d4ec0f7dfcd88abb2.commitMessage: Pull #4328: moved variables inside if blocks to reduce execution time

4d2e6647f9e8385749c382bcab5e64965a943178.commitMessage:
Rename boolean methods to start with question word. #1555

Fixes `BooleanMethodNameMustStartWithQuestion` inspection violations.

Description:
>Reports boolean methods whose names do not start with a question word. Boolean methods that override library methods are ignored by this inspection.

02dfe8c7c51e9df3ad1d3a391c5293c861c1982f.commitMessage:
Remove unnecessary this. #1555

Fixes `UnnecessaryThis` inspection violations after recent commits.

Description:
>Reports on any unnecessary uses of this in the code. Using this to disambiguate a code reference may easily become unnecessary via automatic refactorings, and is discouraged by many coding styles.

1bd30555eac039d0486dffb3fc43b7a34117909b.commitMessage:
Remove useless parentheses to fix PMD violations, issue #744

Parentheses are considered unnecessary if the evaluation order of an expression remains unchanged if the parentheses are removed.
